title.rendered: Whitewater Insider Feb issue goes out today

content.rendered: The February issue of the Whitewater Insider enewsletter goes out today! If you don't get it, please email us at info@coloradorafting.net to sign up. You can read it here as a webpage. Please make sure to read about House Bill 1188: the River Outfitters Viability Act (you can read in previous blog posts about it too). The issue is really heating up and we need your support!
